product_name: DeLorme Wyoming Atlas and Gazatteer - 3rd Edition
long_description: Topographic maps for the entire state of Wyoming in book form, with unequaled backroad detail, including Yellowstone National Park Map & Gazetteer. Map scale is 1:250,000 with a contour interval of 300'; one inch equals four miles. Ideal for outdoor recreation, reference, business, engineering and emergency services; GPS compatible. Special features include BLM & state lands (color coded), publicly owned lands locator map and shaded relief maps. Gazatteer categories include annual events, campgrounds, dude and guest ranches, fishing, hiking, scenic drives and more. DeLorme Publishing; copyright 2001.
short_description: Topographic maps for the entire state of Wyoming in book form, with unequaled backroad detail, including Yellowstone National Park Map & Gazetteer.
